[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]The Boots and Hearts Music Festival is a multi-day country music and camping festival produced by Republic Live Inc.  It is held annually at the custom-designed festival grounds, Burl’s Creek Event Grounds in Oro-Medonte, Ontario, Canada.

We were honoured to get the opportunity to design and custom build this years Boots and Hearts website from scratch.

Return to our Web Development Portfolio & Pricing[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
